head.citation-title: Predicting customer churn in mobile football application
head.abstracts: © 2017 Association for Computing Machinery.Customer churn prediction plays a significant role in various businesses such as telecommunication, banking, and insurance. Accurate churn prediction helps businesses put forward a direct measure toward customers with tendency to leave rather than offering a generic promotion to all. Likewise, mobile application aims not only to acquire new customers but also to retain existing ones. Customer churn prediction in mobile application is a relatively new area, and existing research is limited. This paper proposes a framework for determining, analyzing and predicting customer churn in mobile application.
